member.name: T:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasInputDriverImp
member.summary: Input driver implementation for keyboard and mouse input on Desktop and Android.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasInputDriverImp.#ctor(Fusee.Engine.Common.IRenderCanvasImp)
member.summary: Constructor. Use this in platform specific application projects.
member.param: The render canvas to provide mouse and keyboard input for.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasInputDriverImp.Devices
member.summary: Devices supported by this driver: One mouse and one keyboard.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasInputDriverImp.DriverDesc
member.summary: Returns a human readable description of this driver.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasInputDriverImp.DriverId
member.summary: Returns a (hopefully) unique ID for this driver. Uniqueness is granted by using the full class name (including namespace).

member.name: E:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasInputDriverImp.DeviceDisconnected
member.summary: Not supported on this driver. Mouse and keyboard are considered to be connected all the time. You can register handlers but they will never get called.

member.name: E:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasInputDriverImp.NewDeviceConnected
member.summary: Not supported on this driver. Mouse and keyboard are considered to be connected all the time. You can register handlers but they will never get called.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasInputDriverImp.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Part of the Dispose pattern.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasInputDriverImp.Dispose
member.summary: Part of the dispose pattern.

member.name: T:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.KeyboardDeviceImp
member.summary: Keyboard input device implementation for Desktop an Android platforms.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.KeyboardDeviceImp.#ctor(OpenTK.GameWindow)
member.summary: Should be called by the driver only.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.KeyboardDeviceImp.AxesCount
member.summary: Returns the number of Axes (==0, keyboard does not support any axes).

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.KeyboardDeviceImp.AxisImpDesc
member.summary: Empty enumeration for keyboard, since is 0.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.KeyboardDeviceImp.ButtonCount
member.summary: Returns the number of enum values of

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.KeyboardDeviceImp.ButtonImpDesc
member.summary: Returns a description for each keyboard button.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.KeyboardDeviceImp.Category
member.summary: This is a keyboard device, so this property returns .

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.KeyboardDeviceImp.Desc
member.summary: Human readable description of this device (to be used in dialogs).

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.KeyboardDeviceImp.Id
member.summary: Returns a (hopefully) unique ID for this driver. Uniqueness is granted by using the full class name (including namespace).

member.name: E:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.KeyboardDeviceImp.AxisValueChanged
member.summary: No axes exist on this device, so listeners registered to this event will never get called.

member.name: E:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.KeyboardDeviceImp.ButtonValueChanged
member.summary: All buttons exhibited by this device are event-driven buttons, so this is the point to hook to in order to get information from this device.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.KeyboardDeviceImp.OnGameWinKeyDown(System.Object,OpenTK.Input.KeyboardKeyEventArgs)
member.summary: Called when keyboard button is pressed down.
member.param: The instance containing the event data.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.KeyboardDeviceImp.OnGameWinKeyUp(System.Object,OpenTK.Input.KeyboardKeyEventArgs)
member.summary: Called when keyboard button is released.
member.param: The instance containing the event data.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.KeyboardDeviceImp.GetAxis(System.Int32)
member.summary: This device does not support any axes at all. Always throws.
member.param: No matter what you specify here, you'll evoke an exception.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.KeyboardDeviceImp.GetButton(System.Int32)
member.summary: This device does not support to-be-polled-buttons. All keyboard buttons are event-driven. Listen to the event to reveive keyboard notifications from this device.
member.param: No matter what you specify here, you'll evoke an exception.

member.name: T:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.MouseDeviceImp
member.summary: Mouse input device implementation for Desktop an Android platforms.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.MouseDeviceImp.#ctor(OpenTK.GameWindow)
member.summary: Creates a new mouse input device instance using an existing .
member.param: The game window providing mouse input.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.MouseDeviceImp.AxesCount
member.summary: Number of axes. Here seven: "X", "Y" and "Wheel" as well as MinX, MaxX, MinY and MaxY

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.MouseDeviceImp.AxisImpDesc
member.summary: Returns description information for all axes.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.MouseDeviceImp.ButtonCount
member.summary: Number of buttons exposed by this device. Here three: Left, Middle and Right mouse buttons.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.MouseDeviceImp.ButtonImpDesc
member.summary: A mouse exposes three buttons: left, middle and right.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.MouseDeviceImp.Category
member.summary: Returns , just because it's a mouse.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.MouseDeviceImp.Desc
member.summary: Short description string for this device to be used in dialogs.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.MouseDeviceImp.Id
member.summary: Returns a (hopefully) unique ID for this driver. Uniqueness is granted by using the full class name (including namespace).

member.name: E:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.MouseDeviceImp.AxisValueChanged
member.summary: No event-based axes are exposed by this device. Use to akquire mouse axis information.

member.name: E:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.MouseDeviceImp.ButtonValueChanged
member.summary: All three mouse buttons are event-based. Listen to this event to get information about mouse button state changes.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.MouseDeviceImp.GetAxis(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves values for the X, Y and Wheel axes. No other axes are supported by this device.
member.param: The axis to retrieve information for.
member.returns: The value at the given axis.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.MouseDeviceImp.GetButton(System.Int32)
member.summary: This device does not support to-be-polled-buttons. All mouse buttons are event-driven. Listen to the event to reveive keyboard notifications from this device.
member.param: No matter what you specify here, you'll evoke an exception.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.MouseDeviceImp.OnGameWinMouseDown(System.Object,OpenTK.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)
member.summary: Called when the game window's mouse is pressed down.
member.param: The instance containing the event data.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.MouseDeviceImp.OnGameWinMouseUp(System.Object,OpenTK.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)
member.summary: Called when the game window's mouse is released.
member.param: The instance containing the event data.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.Keymapper.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes the map between KeyCodes and OpenTK.Key

member.name: T:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasWindowImp
member.summary: Use this class as a base class for implementing connectivity to whatever windows system you intend to support. Inherit from this class, make sure to call the constructor with the window handle to render on, implement the Run method and call the DoInit, DoUnload, DoRender and DoResize methods at appropriate incidences. Make sure that _width and _height are set to the new window size before calling DoResize.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasWindowImp.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets the width.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasWindowImp.Height
member.summary: Gets or sets the height.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasWindowImp.Left
member.summary: Gets or sets the left position.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasWindowImp.Top
member.summary: Gets or sets the top position.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasWindowImp.Caption
member.summary: Gets or sets the caption(title of the window).

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasWindowImp.DeltaTime
member.summary: Gets the delta time. The delta time is the time that was required to render the last frame in milliseconds. This value can be used to determine the frames per second of the application.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasWindowImp.VerticalSync
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [vertical synchronize]. This option is used to reduce "Glitches" during rendering.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasWindowImp.EnableBlending
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [enable blending]. Blending is used to display transparent graphics.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasWindowImp.Fullscreen
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [fullscreen] is enabled.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasWindowImp.Timer
member.summary: Gets the timer. The timer value can be used to measure time that passed since the first call of this property.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasWindowImp.#ctor(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasWindowImp.Present
member.summary: Presents the rendered result of this instance. The rendering buffers are flushed and the deltatime is recalulated. Call this function after rendering.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasWindowImp.SetCursor(Fusee.Engine.Common.CursorType)
member.summary: Set the cursor (the mouse pointer image) to one of the pre-defined types
member.param: The type of the cursor to set.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasWindowImp.OpenLink(System.String)
member.summary: Opens the given URL in the user's standard web browser. The link MUST start with "http://" otherwis

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasWindowImp.SetWindowSize(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the size of the output window for desktop development.
member.param: The x position of the window.
The y position of the window.
Show the window border or not.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasWindowImp.CloseGameWindow
member.summary: Closes the GameWindow with a call to opentk.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasWindowImp.Run
member.summary: Runs this application instance.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasWindowImp.Dispose
member.summary: Releases this instance for garbage collection. Do not call this method in frequent updates because of performance reasons.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasWindowImp.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases unmanaged and - optionally - managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasWindowImp.Finalize
member.summary: Finalizes an instance of the class.

member.name: T:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasImp
member.summary: This is a default render canvas implementation creating its own rendering window.

member.summary: Implementation Tasks: Gets or sets the width(pixel units) of the Canvas.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasImp.Height
member.summary: Gets or sets the height in pixel units.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasImp.Caption
member.summary: Gets or sets the caption(title of the window).

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasImp.DeltaTime
member.summary: Gets the delta time. The delta time is the time that was required to render the last frame in milliseconds. This value can be used to determine the frames per second of the application.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasImp.VerticalSync
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [vertical synchronize]. This option is used to reduce "Glitches" during rendering.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasImp.EnableBlending
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [enable blending]. Blending is used to render transparent objects.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasImp.Fullscreen
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [fullscreen] is enabled.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasImp.Focused
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether [focused]. This property is used to identify if this application is the active window of the user.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasImp.VideoWallMode
member.summary: Activates (true) or deactivates (false) the video wall feature.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasImp.TryptMonitorSetupVertical
member.summary: This represents the number of the monitors in a vertical column.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasImp.TryptMonitorSetupHorizontal
member.summary: This represents the number of the monitors in a horizontal row.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasImp.Dispose
member.summary: Implementation of the Dispose pattern. Disposes of the OpenTK game window.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderCanvasImp.VideoWall(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Changes the window of the application to video wall mode.
member.param: Number of monitors on horizontal axis.
Number of monitors on vertical axis.
Start the window in activated state-
Start the window with a hidden windows border.

member.summary: Presents this application instance. Call this function after rendering to show the final image. After Present is called the render buffers get flushed.

member.summary: Implementation of the interface for usage with OpenTK framework.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderContextImp.UpdateTextureFromVideoStream(Fusee.Engine.Common.IVideoStreamImp,Fusee.Engine.Common.ITexture)
member.summary: Updates a texture with images obtained from a Video.
member.param: The Video from which the images are taken.
The texture to which the ImageData is bound to.
member.remarks: Look at the VideoTextureExample for further information.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderContextImp.UpdateTextureRegion(Fusee.Engine.Common.ITexture,Fusee.Base.Common.ImageData,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Updates a specific rectangle of a texture.
member.param: The texture to which the ImageData is bound to.
The ImageData-Struct containing information about the image.
The x-value of the upper left corner of th rectangle.
The y-value of the upper left corner of th rectangle.
member.remarks: /// Look at the VideoTextureExample for further information.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderContextImp.CreateTexture(Fusee.Base.Common.ImageData,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new Texture and binds it to the shader.
member.param: A given ImageData object, containing all necessary information for the upload to the graphics card.
Indicating if the texture should be clamped or repeated.
member.returns: An ITexture that can be used for texturing in the shader. In this implementation, the handle is an integer-value which is necessary for OpenTK.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderContextImp.CreateWritableTexture(System.Int32,System.Int32,Fusee.Engine.Common.WritableTextureFormat)
member.summary: Creates a new writable texture and binds it to the shader. Creates also a framebufferobject and installs convenience methods for binding and reading.
member.returns: An ITexture that can be used for texturing in the shader. In this implementation, the handle is an integer-value which is necessary for OpenTK.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderContextImp.GetShaderParam(Fusee.Engine.Common.IShaderProgramImp,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the shader parameter. The Shader parameter is used to bind values inside of shaderprograms that run on the graphics card. Do not use this function in frequent updates as it transfers information from graphics card to the cpu which takes time.
member.returns: The Shader parameter is returned if the name is found, otherwise null.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderContextImp.GetParamValue(Fusee.Engine.Common.IShaderProgramImp,Fusee.Engine.Common.IShaderParam)
member.summary: Gets the float parameter value inside a shaderprogram by using a as search reference. Do not use this function in frequent updates as it transfers information from graphics card to the cpu which takes time.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderContextImp.GetShaderParamList(Fusee.Engine.Common.IShaderProgramImp)
member.summary: Gets the shader parameter list of a specific .
member.returns: All Shader parameters of a shaderprogram are returned.

An ITexture probably returned from CreateTexture method

member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the background.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderContextImp.ClearDepth
member.summary: Gets or sets the clear depth value which is used to clear the depth buffer.
member.value: Specifies the depth value used when the depth buffer is cleared. The initial value is 1. This value is clamped to the range [0,1].

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.RenderContextImp.CreateShader(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates the shaderprogram by using a valid GLSL vertex and fragment shader code. This code is compiled at runtime. Do not use this function in frequent updates.

member.summary: Sets the shaderprogram onto the GL Rendercontext.

member.summary: Remove an attribute buffer previously created with and release all associated resources allocated on the GPU.

member.summary: Binds the vertices onto the GL Rendercontext and assigns an VertexBuffer index to the passed instance.
member.exception: Vertices must not be null or empty

member.summary: Binds the normals onto the GL Rendercontext and assigns an NormalBuffer index to the passed instance.
member.exception: Normals must not be null or empty

member.summary: Binds the boneindices onto the GL Rendercontext and assigns an BondeIndexBuffer index to the passed instance.
member.exception: BoneIndices must not be null or empty

member.summary: Binds the boneweights onto the GL Rendercontext and assigns an BondeWeightBuffer index to the passed instance.
member.exception: BoneWeights must not be null or empty

member.name: T:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.WindowsTouchInputDriverImp
member.summary: Input driver implementation supporting Windows 8 touch input as described in https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/hh454904(v=vs.85).aspx

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.WindowsTouchInputDriverImp.#ctor(Fusee.Engine.Common.IRenderCanvasImp)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The render canvas. Internally this must be a Windows canvas with a valid window handle.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.WindowsTouchInputDriverImp.Devices
member.summary: Retrieves a list of devices supported by this input driver.
member.remarks: The devices yielded represent the current status. At any time other devices can connect or disconnect. Listen to the and events to get informed about new or vanishing devices. Drivers may implement "static" access to devices such that devices are connected at driver instantiation and never disconnected (in this case and are never fired).

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.WindowsTouchInputDriverImp.DriverId
member.summary: Gets the unique driver identifier.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.WindowsTouchInputDriverImp.DriverDesc
member.summary: Gets the driver description string.
member.value: A human-readable string describing the driver.

member.name: E:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.WindowsTouchInputDriverImp.DeviceDisconnected
member.summary: Not supported on this driver. Mouse and keyboard are considered to be connected all the time. You can register handlers but they will never get called.

member.name: E:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.WindowsTouchInputDriverImp.NewDeviceConnected
member.summary: Not supported on this driver. Mouse and keyboard are considered to be connected all the time. You can register handlers but they will never get called.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.WindowsTouchInputDriverImp.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Part of the Dispose pattern.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.WindowsTouchInputDriverImp.Dispose
member.summary: Part of the dispose pattern.

member.name: T:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.WindowsTouchInputDeviceImp
member.summary: Touch input device implementation for the Windows platform. This implementation directly sniffes at the render window's message pump (identified by the parameter passed to the constructor) to receive WM_POINTER messages.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.WindowsTouchInputDeviceImp.#ctor(OpenTK.GameWindow)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The game window to hook on to reveive WM_POINTER messages.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.WindowsTouchInputDeviceImp.Desc
member.summary: Short description string for this device to be used in dialogs.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.WindowsTouchInputDeviceImp.Id
member.summary: Returns a (hopefully) unique ID for this driver. Uniqueness is granted by using the full class name (including namespace).

member.name: E:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.WindowsTouchInputDeviceImp.AxisValueChanged
member.summary: Occurs on value changes of axes exhibited by this device. Only applies for axes where the is set to false.

member.name: E:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.WindowsTouchInputDeviceImp.ButtonValueChanged
member.summary: A touchpoints's contact state is communicated by a button.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.WindowsTouchInputDeviceImp.Category
member.summary: Returns , just because it's a touch tevice :-).

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.WindowsTouchInputDeviceImp.AxesCount
member.summary: Returns the number of axes. Up to five touchpoints (with two axes (X and Y) per Touchpoint plus one axis carrying the number of currently touched touchpoints plus four axes describing the minimum and maximum X and Y values.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.WindowsTouchInputDeviceImp.AxisImpDesc
member.summary: Returns description information for all axes.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.WindowsTouchInputDeviceImp.GetAxis(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves values for the number of currently active touchpoints and the touches min and max values. The touchpoint X and Y axes themselves are event-based axes. Do not query them here.
member.param: The axis to retrieve information for.
member.returns: The value at the given axis.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.WindowsTouchInputDeviceImp.ButtonCount
member.summary: Retrieves the button count. One button for each of the up to five supported touchpoints signalling that the touchpoint currently has contact.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.WindowsTouchInputDeviceImp.ButtonImpDesc
member.summary: Retrieve a description for each button.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.WindowsTouchInputDeviceImp.GetButton(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the button state. This device's buttons signal that a finger (nose, elbow, knee...) currently has contact with the scree surface.
member.returns: true if the button is hit, else false

member.name: T:Fusee.Engine.Imp.Graphics.Desktop.AttributeImp
member.summary: Contains a handle for any type of attribute buffer stored on GPU memory such as vertices, normals, uvs etc.
